title: July 4, 2077
body: It's been almost a month since I put the dam on lockdown. I am the only one who can override it. Some are beginning to get angry and restless. We had to restrain Charles and lock him in a containment cell because he tried to tamper with the door controls. Morale is extremely low and I am not popular. I don't know what to do. George and Susan are dying.....and I am helpless.
